>
[Warding Tablets](/Equipment.aspx?ID=997)
</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 163 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This grimoire takes the form of a series of baked clay tablets. Any text inked upon it turns swiftly into carved depressions.
